issues.title: Client portal login timeout
issues.description: Users experiencing session timeouts after 15 minutes instead of expected 30 minutes

issues.title: Document template merge failing
issues.description: Word document templates not merging client data correctly for property transactions

issues.description: Search functionality taking 5+ seconds for matters with large document sets

issues.description: Clients receiving duplicate notification emails for matter updates

issues.title: Calendar sync missing appointments
issues.description: Some client appointments not syncing to Outlook calendars

issues.title: Time tracking rounding issues
issues.description: Recorded time entries showing incorrect rounded values in reports

issues.title: File upload progress indicator
issues.description: Large document uploads showing no progress feedback to users

issues.title: Manually added issue
